setting.name: UIPassword
setting.description: Password for HTTP configuration interface (0 = disabled).

setting.name: UseTFTP
setting.description: Enable TFTP server for ATA configuration.

setting.name: TftpURL
setting.description: Specify IP address or URL of the TFTP server.

setting.name: CfgInterval
setting.description: Period to check for updates to configuration information. Random number from 1-1800 is added.

setting.name: DHCP
setting.label: Enable DHCP
setting.description: If 1, enable DHCP.

setting.name: StaticIP
setting.description: Statically assigned IP address.

setting.name: StaticRoute
setting.description: Statically assigned default router IP address.

setting.name: StaticNetMask
setting.description: Statically assigned IP subnet mask.

setting.name: DNS1IP
setting.description: Statically assigned primary DNS server address.

setting.name: DNS2IP
setting.description: Statically assigned secondary DNS server address.

setting.name: NTPIP
setting.description: Statically assigned NTP server IP address.

setting.name: AltNTPIP
setting.description: Statically assigned alternate NTP server IP address.

setting.name: OpFlags
setting.description: Various operational features (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: VLANSetting
setting.description: VLAN-related settings (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: TOS
setting.description: Type of Service configuration (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: L2KeepAlive
setting.description: (no documentation found)

setting.name: NATIP
setting.description: WAN IP address of the attached router/NAT (SIP behind a NAT).

setting.name: NatServer
setting.description: Server to which dummy UDP packets are sent to maintain a NAT translation for a session.

setting.name: NatTimer
setting.description: Operational parameters for NAT (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: UseLoginID
setting.description: Use LoginID as the authentication ID, otherwise use UID.

setting.name: SIPRegOn
setting.description: Enable SIP registration.

setting.name: SIPRegInterval
setting.description: SIP registration renewal interval in seconds.

setting.name: Proxy
setting.description: Proxy or registrar address (0 = disabled).

setting.name: SecProxy
setting.description: Backup proxy address (0 = disabled).

setting.name: SecProxyTimeOut
setting.description: Timeout before failing back to primary proxy server (0 = not until backup fails).

setting.name: SipOutBoundProxy
setting.label: OutBoundProxy
setting.description: SIP proxy server to which all outgoing SIP requests are sent.

setting.name: SIPPort
setting.description: The port for SIP requests.

setting.name: MediaPort
setting.description: The base port for RTP media.

setting.name: MAXRedirect
setting.description: Maximum number of forwards for a call.

setting.name: MsgRetryLimits
setting.description: Configure retry limits (see ATA administration guide)

setting.name: SessionTimer
setting.description: Configure SIP session timer (see ATA administration guide)

setting.name: SessionInterval
setting.description: Interval between SIP session refreshes (seconds).

setting.name: MinSessionInterval
setting.description: Minimum required interval between SIP session refreshes.

setting.name: DialTone
setting.description: Dial tone format (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: BusyTone
setting.description: Busy tone format (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: ReorderTone
setting.description: Reorder tone format (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: RingBackTone
setting.description: Ring-back tone format (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: CallWaitTone
setting.description: Call-waiting tone format (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: RingOnOffTime
setting.description: Ringer cadence pattern (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: RxCodec
setting.description: Receiving-audio codec preference (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: TxCodec
setting.description: Transmitting-audio codec preference (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: AudioMode
setting.description: Audio operating mode (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: NumTxFrames
setting.description: Default RTP packet size in frames per packet.

setting.name: CallFeatures
setting.description: Call feature settings (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: PaidFeatures
setting.description: Call feature settings (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: CallCmd
setting.description: Call command control table (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: FeatureTimer
setting.description: Timing values for telephone features (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: FeatureTimer2
setting.description: Timing values for ATA features (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: SigTimer
setting.description: Various timeout values (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: TimeZone
setting.description: Timezone offset in hours (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: ConnectMode
setting.description: Call signaling protocol control (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: CallerIdMethod
setting.description: Timing values for telephone features (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: IPDialPlan
setting.description: Allow IP-like destination address in DialPlan (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: DialPlan
setting.description: The programmable dial plan (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: DialPlanEx
setting.description: The programmable dial plan (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: ACRDN
setting.description: Anonymous call rejection directory number.

setting.name: TraceFlags
setting.description: Set trace features for diagnostic use.

setting.name: NPrintf
setting.description: Set host for debugging messages.

setting.name: SyslogCtrl
setting.description: Turn on specific syslog traces.

setting.name: SyslogIP
setting.description: Syslog server address.

setting.name: upgradecode
setting.label: Software image
setting.description: Name of software image in TFTP directory.

setting.name: imageid
setting.label: Image ID
setting.description: Image ID of software image in TFTP directory.

setting.name: TOS
setting.description: Type of Service configuration (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: DialTone2
setting.description: Alert tone format (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: logofile
setting.label: Logo filename
setting.description: Name of logo file in TFTP directory.

setting.name: imageid
setting.label: Image ID
setting.description: Logo image version number.

setting.name: ServicesUrl
setting.description: URL to contact for XML Services.

setting.name: DirectoriesUrl
setting.description: URL to contact for Directory Services.

setting.name: CallForwardNumber
setting.description: Phone number to forward all calls.

setting.name: VoiceMailNumber
setting.description: Phone number to access voice mail.

setting.name: TimeFormat
setting.description: Time display format on LCD screen.

setting.name: DateFormat
setting.description: Date display format on LCD screen.

setting.name: DoNotDisturb
setting.description: Activate Do Not Disturb feature.

setting.name: BlockCallerId
setting.description: Enable blocking of outgoing Caller ID.

setting.name: CallWaiting
setting.description: Enable call waiting for every call.

setting.name: AttendedTransfer
setting.description: Enable attended call transfer.

setting.name: BlindTransfer
setting.description: Enable blind call transfer.

setting.name: Conference
setting.description: Enable 3-way conference.

setting.name: BlockAnonymous
setting.description: Activate blocking of anonymous incoming call.

setting.name: AutoLookUp
setting.description: Enable automatic phone number lookup when dialing.

setting.name: ForwardToVMDelay
setting.description: Number of seconds before forwarding to VoiceMailNumber.

setting.name: CallPrefGuiShow
setting.description: Control whether a call preference option is displayed.

setting.name: CallPrefGuiSet
setting.description: Control whether a call preference option can be set by user.

setting.name: TOS
setting.description: Type of Service configuration (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: AlertTone
setting.description: Alert tone format (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: SITone
setting.description: Special information tone format (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: LBRCodec
setting.description: Available low-bit-rate codecs (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: FXSInputLevel
setting.description: Input level control of the FXS ports.

setting.name: FXSOutputLevel
setting.description: Output level control of the FXS ports.

setting.name: Polarity
setting.description: Line polarity of FXS ports (see ATA administration guide).

setting.name: TraceFlags
setting.description: Set trace features for diagnostic use.
